title: Zest
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The meat offered is fish and poultry, no red meat. A healthier food concept with food made in-house daily with many organic produce whenever possible. Many vegetarian choices. Quick service, open space with view of kitchen.
